data.enText: a thing that can be dangerous or cause damage

data.chText: 日益严重的污染对当地人民的健康构成了重大威胁。
data.enText: Growing levels of pollution represent a serious health hazard to the local population.

data.chText: 大家都明白吸烟的危害。
data.enText: Everybody is aware of the hazards of smoking.
hazard lights (= flashing lights on a car that warn other drivers of possible danger)
to make a suggestion or guess which you know may be wrong
Would you like to hazard a guess ?

data.chText: “你是要和汤姆一起去吗？”她冒失地问。
data.enText: ‘Is it Tom you're going with?’ she hazarded.
to risk sth or put it in danger

data.chText: 粗心大意的驾驶者拿他人和自己的生命冒险。
data.enText: Careless drivers hazard other people's lives as well as their own.

ex.chText: 手术成功，病人脱离了危险。
ex.enText: The operation was a success and the patient was out of danger.

ex.chText: 工人们认为他们有生命危险。
ex.enText: The workers believe that their lives are in danger.

synonyms.bx: 指可能造成伤害、损害或死亡的任何情况。

ex.chText: 很多严重的健康隐患都与饮酒有关。
ex.enText: Many serious health hazards are associated with drinking.

ex.chText: 受污染的环境会对当地居民构成危险。
ex.enText: A polluted environment is a hazard to local residents.

synonyms.bx: 多指可能具有危险、会引起事故或问题的事物，常含有严重风险的意味。

ex.chText: 他的新公司目前处于严重危机中。
ex.enText: His new business is now in serious peril.

ex.chText: 那些勇敢的士兵冒着生命危险去炸毁敌人的碉堡。
ex.enText: Those brave soldiers put their lives in peril to bomb the blockhouse of their enemy.

synonyms.bx: 尤指可能造成损害或死亡的严重危险。

ex.chText: 他还是小孩子的时候，从不敢在晚上外出。
ex.enText: He never ventured out at night when he was a child.

ex.chText: 有人在敲门，她犹豫了一下，然后大着胆子下楼，走向门口。
ex.enText: Someone was knocking, and she paused before venturing downstairs to the door.
It's very bold of you to venture to do so.

synonyms.bx: 指冒风险试一试，或是去可能会有危险的地方，或是做有风险的事。

ex.chText: 那个逃跑的奴隶决定留在山洞里，因为他不敢冒险被人发现。
ex.enText: The runaway slave decided to stay in the cave because he couldn't chance being found.

ex.chText: 他不知道另一条路线是不是能节省更多的时间，但是他决定冒一下险。
ex.enText: He was not sure if another route could save him more time, but he decided to chance it.

synonyms.bx: 指做自己觉得可能有风险的事情。

ex.chText: 粗心大意的驾驶者拿乘客和自己的生命冒险。
ex.enText: Careless drivers hazard passengers' lives as well as their own.
I wouldn't like to hazard a guess.

synonyms.bx: 指为获得某物而冒失去钱财等的风险，也指冒险猜测、建议等。

ex.chText: 难道你不认为吸烟者其实是在拿自己的健康去冒险吗？
ex.enText: Don't you think that smokers are actually risking their own health?

ex.chText: 那名政客准备不惜一切来避免离婚。
ex.enText: That politician has prepared to risk everything to avoid divorce.

ex.chText: 如果不能得到那笔贷款，他们就有可能失去公司。
ex.enText: If they cannot get that loan, they may risk losing the company.

ex.chText: 你可以编个迟到的理由，但我不想冒这个险。
ex.enText: You could make up a reason for being late, but I wouldn't risk it.

synonyms.bx: 指使遭受失去、毁坏、伤害等风险或承担此类风险去做某事，也指做有危险或不好结果的事。

d: 使…冒风险；冒…的风险；冒险做

tr: an obstacle on a golf course
an unknown and unpredictable phenomenon that causes an event to result one way rather than another
example: we ran into each other by pure chance

tr: a possibility of incurring loss or misfortune
example: drinking alcohol is a health hazard

tr: put forward, of a guess, in spite of possible refutation
example: I am guessing that the price of real estate will rise again
I cannot pretend to say that you are wrong

tr: take a risk in the hope of a favorable outcome
example: When you buy these stocks you are gambling
I will stake my good reputation for this

value.def: A hazard is something which could be dangerous to you, your health or safety, or your plans or reputation.

example.ex: A new report suggests that chewing-gum may be a health hazard...
example.tran: 一份新报告指出，口香糖可能对健康有害。

example.ex: Oil leaking from a barge in the Mississippi River poses a hazard to the drinking water of New Orleans.
example.tran: 密西西比河上驳船漏油事件危及新奥尔良市的饮用水。

value.def: If you hazard someone or something, you put them into a situation which might be dangerous for them.

example.ex: He could not believe that, had the Englishman known how much he was at risk, he would have hazarded his grandson.
example.tran: 他无法相信，如果当时那个英国人知道他冒的风险有多大，他还会让自己的孙子去冒这个险。

value.tran: 使冒风险;使处于危险中

value.def: If you hazard or if you hazard a guess, you make a suggestion about something which is only a guess and which you know might be wrong.

example.ex: I would hazard a guess that they'll do fairly well in the next election...
example.tran: 我斗胆猜测，他们在下一轮竞选中会有不错的表现。

value.tran: 斗胆提出;作无把握猜测

trans: 危险分析；危害分析；危险性分析；是由食品的危害分析；风险分析
火灾；火灾隐患；着火危险
危险源辨识；危害识别；危害鉴定；危害辨识；危险源识别
职业危害；业余爱好的风险
冒着一切危险；冒一切危险；不顾一切危险
污染危害；污染危险；污染危险条款
